title: Media sensationalism and inaccurate reporting influences the public perception of truth, what is right and wrong
content:
Media organizations have the power and advantages over other organizations as they have a strong influence on the dissemination of information to the public.

Common methods used by media for influencing the public perception:

  • Misleading headings and content
  • Sensationalism (too much emphasis on a single point of view)
  • Being selective on what information to publish (imbalanced reporting)
  • Clickbaits and catchy headings
